titleStmt.title: A letter from the Parliament of Scotland to the Parliament of England with severall demands therein, in relation to the King and both kingdomes. Also, the copy of the oath taken by all the members of the Parliament in Scotland, and some orders made since their sitting.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B.D. and are to be sold neer the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 16 1647"; the 8 in the imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
